title: Create a 'Best Of' Collection
description: At the end of the year, an editor wants to create a collection of the publication's 10 best investigative reports from that year.

tasks.description: Search the archive for all articles published in the last year with the tag 'investigative'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of all investigative pieces is generated.

tasks.description: Review the list with senior editors to select the 10 most impactful reports.
tasks.expected_outcome: A curated list of the top 10 stories is created.

tasks.description: Create a new 'collection' page in the CMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new page is created to house the collection.

tasks.description: Add links and summaries for the 10 selected articles to the collection page and publish it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The 'Best of the Year' collection is live.
